post.cooked:
All human societies are based upon, and their continuity and growth are reinforced by, the use of hope, feat and repetition.

Although this simple structure is not visible to the overwhelming majority of people, everyone who is concerned with human groupings uses and approves the application of hope, fear and repetition.
post.topic_title: The Basic and Unfamiliar Human Community
post.raw:
All human societies are based upon, and their continuity and growth are reinforced by, the use of hope, feat and repetition.

Although this simple structure is not visible to the overwhelming majority of people, everyone who is concerned with human groupings uses and approves the application of hope, fear and repetition.
